::KitKat::

She was hit by a shot in the hip while in wolf mode.  It knocked her down 
and she gave a loud yelp.  She got up and tried to run as fast as she could 
through the trees.  She saw Quickstike behind a tree and got beind another 
tree near him and crouched behind it.
"You got a place we can go to? I'm hit and you don't look so good yourself. 
You OK? Can you still run or are we just going to stand and fght?"


-------Original Message----------
>From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Neo Beast Wars
>Quickstrike/Cheetor:
>
>
>
>
>Quickstrike was surprised to see another bot coming out of the forest, 
>going
>for the Maximal. She sounded Predacon, thank Primus. He gave her quick eye
>contact. She ran at the spot where Cheetor was twice. The third time, he 
>saw
>him rush out. He heard him growl, throwing his legs out to run. That was
>Cheetor? But that thing was nothing but a pile of fur and spots.
>
>"What in tarnation?"
>
>But after a few seconds some of it made some sense. Before the youth had a
>flight mode, being all metal, he was once a pure cheetah.
>
>He ran after him. He fired at the youth, at his flank. But the shot went
>past him.
>
>He saw the youth spin around and transform. He withdrew a gun and fired at
>them. He fired at KitKat, then three times at himself. Quickstrike nearly
>stumbled. He almost lost his leg from the shot, but he managed to dash to a
>tree.
